Class BlobImpl

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.jtds.jdbc.BlobImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.sql.Blob
public class BlobImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.sql.Blob

An in-memory or disk based representation of binary data.
